name: DelveTris
description:
Dig into the earth, uncover and defeat monsters, and avoid dying to your own bombs or the monster's attacks. Monster encounters happen each time you dig through 5 rows of dirt. Fight 6 different enemies with unique attack patterns, while fighting off the ever increasing pace of your own falling bricks.

Made for Mini Jam 109: Depths.

Future versions may feature better sprites, an upgrade system and more enemies

BGM by theblockofsound235 at Freesound

Made with Godot and Krita

Controls:

Left/right arrow keys - Left/right block movement

Up arrow - rotate

z - rotate left

x - rotate right

shift or c - hold

spacebar - hard drop
